fr.adaming.managedBean

Class ClientMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.adaming.managedBean.ClientMB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ClientMB
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class handle the link between ServiceClient package and the View module Methods defined here have a key word String as a return used as a navigation tool Methods defined here have a void as input parameters
    Author:
    POUNCHOU Julien, BARBISAN Benoit
    See Also:
